snippet: The Catalan director Calixto Bieito has a reputation for being provocative. American audiences will get a chance to see for themselves with “Camino Real,” at the Goodman in Chicago.
abstract: Little-seen Tennessee Williams play Camino Real opens at the Goodman Theater in Chicago from Catalan director Calixto Bieito, who has a reputation for provocative productions.
lead_paragraph: The Catalan director Calixto Bieito has a reputation for being provocative. American audiences will get a chance to see for themselves with “Camino Real,” at the Goodman in Chicago.

headline.seo: Calixto Bieito Directs Williams’s ‘Camino Real’ in Chicago
headline.main: Don’t Fixate on the Orgies; He Has Vision
headline.print_headline: Don’t Fixate On the Orgies; He Has Vision
